nchack.NCData.cor_time¶

NCData.cor_time(self, var1=None, var2=None)¶

Calculate the correlation correct in time between two variables, for each grid cell

Parameters

  • var1 (str) -- The first variable

  • var2 (str) -- The second variable

Returns

New tracker with the correlation coefficients

Return type

nchack.NCData
